message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible potential, I'm asking for $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its true value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. This is the highest I can go for now.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly exceptional. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,225,000. I believe this price point represents a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,175,000. This is my final offer.
